description: Great ride from Canmore to Banff as it is all downhill, a few rough spots from the 2013 flood. Coming back much harder as you gain ~300m over 18Km trip
directions: Goat Creek Parking lot at top of Spray-Dorion Road or start in Banff at back parking lot of Banff Springs Hotel
title: GoatCreekTrail-to_BowFallsBanff
